law.catch_line: The Board may apply for relief by injunction, without bond, to enforce any provision of this subtitl...
law.text:
The Board may apply for relief by injunction, without bond, to enforce any provision of this subtitle or to restrain a violation of any provision of this subtitle. In these proceedings the Board does not have to allege or prove that:
An adequate remedy at law does not exist; or
Substantial or irreparable damage would result from the continued violations.
